transcript:
Group mein daal to sahi likhi hai number de customer ko yaar. Jagah upar ho daal dego. Hello.
Executive: Hello, Mr. Dheeraj Sharma baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Shree Shakti sir, good morning. Main Reshu baat kar rahi hoon India Mart se sir.
Customer: 10 minute mein call karta hoon madam main. Thoda kaam mein lag raha hoon.
Executive: 10 minute mein baat ho sakti hai. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer will call back in 10 minutes due to being busy.



Resolution:

- Agreed to call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will wait for the customer to call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call back, india mart
